title: Peer to Peer Transfer not staying checked
body: Playing on the mac client on a new computer and every time i launch the patcher it is unchecked and i need it to stay checked otherwise i have trouble connecting to games from a different bug.  So how do I make peer to peer stay checked?  Thanks

replies.body:
We removed the peer-to-peer component to patching a while ago, so that option should not affect your client or connection. I've never heard of it being helpful in preventing connection problems, so I'm not sure why it would affect this. 

By a large margin, most issues with connections are caused by local network settings that conflict with League. My recommendation would be to work through the steps outlined in our [Mac Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) as a first step. 

Let me know if this issue persists.
